name: Pushingo (Gameboy)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Pocket. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2021. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby!

This game is an entry for the Gameboy Competition 2021. (https://itch.io/jam/gbcompo21)

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console! 

Original Story:

The princess is in danger!
You are the only one who can save her.
A cute logical game for kids.

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Push: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Push: Z
